text:
This is serious - but can't be fixed easily. Maybe in jasper34 - not sure.

The problem is simple - the generated code is bigger than the VM can handle.
You may try with a different compiler, which may be able to work around jump
sizes ( I'm not sure where the error happens - it may be in the catch blocks
- jasper34 might help if this is the case ).

The workaround is to use requestdispatcher and include - it will generate
2 pages, each with shorter service method. If possible, please send the taglib
so we can compile and test.
